Name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles
About the game: Solve jigsaw puzzles and discover a new world of fantasy. Piece together stylistic digital artwork featuring elves, dwarves, wizards, goblins and much more! Enjoy a selection of 20 fantasy puzzles, expandable up to 200 with DLC. Customize your game with jigsaw size and piece shape options. The puzzles can be as challenging as you decide. Enjoy an immersive fantasy experience, with atmospheric interface and soundtrack. Are you ready? Begin your fantasy puzzle adventure!
